segments.text: All right , let's see who's ruining my TV time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you going to do ? Call my boss and chew him out ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is your boss named Vic ? Your pager says , This is Vic . Here I come !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Impossible . My pager is really old . It doesn't display messages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here , see for yourself . That's really strange ! It's almost the same as when I ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Gosh , you're right ! It's from some guy named Vic . I wonder who he is ...
segments.speaker: S2
